data.sentence: The word مَعَنَا comes from the root م ع and is associated with the meanings: With

data.meanings: to send a messenger, bestow, let go. rasul (pl. rusul) - envoy, bearer of a message, messenger. risalat - message, commission, mission, epistle. arsala (vb. 4) - to send. mursalat (pl. of mursalatun) - those sent forth.
data.sentence: The word أَرْسِلْهُ comes from the root ر س ل and is associated with the meanings: to send a messenger, bestow, let go. rasul (pl. rusul) - envoy, bearer of a message, messenger. risalat - message, commission, mission, epistle. arsala (vb. 4) - to send. mursalat (pl. of mursalatun) - those sent forth.

data.meanings: early part of morning, morrow, morning, time between the prayer of daybreak and sunrise, first part of the day
data.sentence: The word غَدًا comes from the root غ د و and is associated with the meanings: early part of morning, morrow, morning, time between the prayer of daybreak and sunrise, first part of the day

data.meanings: played/sported/gamed/jested/joked, passtime (in an unserious thing), engage in idle sport without meaning or purpose, slaver/drivel, stupid/fool.
data.sentence: The word وَيَلْعَبْ comes from the root ل ع ب and is associated with the meanings: played/sported/gamed/jested/joked, passtime (in an unserious thing), engage in idle sport without meaning or purpose, slaver/drivel, stupid/fool.

data.meanings: To guard, protect, take care of, watch, put in store, preserve, learn by heart.
data.sentence: The word لَحَافِظُونَ comes from the root ح ف ظ and is associated with the meanings: To guard, protect, take care of, watch, put in store, preserve, learn by heart.
